verses.verse: Moreover, the word<WH1697> of the Lord<WH3068> came<WH1961> to me saying,<WH559>
"Son<WH1121> of man,<WH120> set<WH7760> your face<WH6440> against<WH5921> Mount<WH2022> Seir,<WH8165> and prophesy<WH5012> against<WH5921> it,

and say<WH559> to it, 'Thus<WH3541> says<WH559> the Lord<WH136> God,<WH3068> "Behold,<WH2009> I am against<WH413> you, Mount<WH2022> Seir,<WH8165> And I will stretch<WH5186> out My hand<WH3027> against<WH5921> you, And I will make<WH5414> you a desolation<WH8077> and a waste.<WH4923>
"I will lay<WH7760> waste<WH2723> your cities,<WH5892> And you will become<WH1961> a desolation.<WH8077> Then you will know<WH3045> that I am the Lord.<WH3068>

"Because<WH3282> you have had<WH1961> everlasting<WH5769> enmity<WH342> and have delivered<WH5064> the sons<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> to the power<WH3027> of the sword<WH2719> at the time<WH6256> of their calamity,<WH343> at the time<WH6256> of the punishment<WH5771> of the end,<WH7093>

therefore,<WH3651> as I live,<WH2416>" declares<WH5002> the Lord<WH136> God,<WH3068> "I will give<WH6213> you over<WH6213> to bloodshed,<WH1818> and bloodshed<WH1818> will pursue<WH7291> you; since<WH518> you have not hated<WH8130> bloodshed,<WH1818> therefore bloodshed<WH1818> will pursue<WH7291> you.

"And I will make<WH5414> Mount<WH2022> Seir<WH8165> a waste<WH8077> and a desolation,<WH8077> and I will cut<WH3772> off<WH3772> from it the one who passes<WH5674> through<WH5674> and returns.<WH7725>

"And I will fill<WH4390> its mountains<WH2022> with its slain;<WH2491> on your hills<WH1389> and in your valleys<WH1516> and in all<WH3605> your ravines<WH650> those slain<WH2491> by the sword<WH2719> will fall.<WH5307>
"I will make<WH5414> you an everlasting<WH5769> desolation,<WH8077> and your cities<WH5892> will not be inhabited.<WH3427> Then you will know<WH3045> that I am the Lord.<WH3068>

"Because<WH3282> you have said,<WH559> 'These two<WH8147> nations<WH1471> and these two<WH8147> lands<WH776> will be mine, and we will possess<WH3423> them,' although the Lord<WH3068> was there,<WH8033>

therefore,<WH3651> as I live,<WH2416>" declares<WH5002> the Lord<WH136> God,<WH3068> "I will deal<WH6213> [with you] according to your anger<WH639> and according to your envy<WH7068> which<WH834> you showed<WH6213> because<WH4480> of your hatred<WH8135> against them; so I will make<WH3045> Myself known<WH3045> among them when<WH9201> I judge<WH8199> you.

"Then you will know<WH3045> that I, the Lord,<WH3068> have heard<WH8085> all<WH3605> your revilings<WH9308> which<WH834> you have spoken<WH559> against<WH5921> the mountains<WH2022> of Israel<WH3478> saying,<WH559> 'They are laid<WH8074> desolate;<WH8074> they are given<WH5414> to us for food.<WH402>'
"And you have spoken<WH1431> <WH6310> arrogantly<WH1431> against<WH5921> Me and have multiplied<WH6280> your words<WH1697> against<WH5921> Me; I have heard.<WH8085>"
'Thus<WH3541> says<WH559> the Lord<WH136> God,<WH3068> "As all<WH3605> the earth<WH776> rejoices,<WH8055> I will make<WH6213> you a desolation.<WH8077>

"As you rejoiced<WH8055> over the inheritance<WH5159> of the house<WH1004> of Israel<WH3478> because<WH5921> <WH834> it was desolate,<WH8074> so<WH3651> I will do<WH6213> to you. You will be a desolation,<WH8077> O Mount<WH2022> Seir,<WH8165> and all<WH3605> Edom,<WH9000> all<WH3605> of it. Then they will know<WH3045> that I am the Lord.<WH3068>"'
